hist: you are a XML file parser, you are required to answer questions pertaining to the given XML file.

dentist dentist essence dentist far dentist groot dentist cafe dentist monkey cafe apple

perish qualify monkey salvage transformer unique vigor ravish banana yogurt zen apple banana banana banana X-ray dentist banana essence banana far banana groot banana cafe banana idiot banana jargon banana kangaroo banana lamb banana halo banana nob banana oops banana perish banana qualify banana monkey banana wake transformer banana unique banana vigor banana wake banana salvage banana yogurt banana zen banana apple cafe banana cafe X-ray banana dentist cafe essence cafe far cafe groot cafe cafe cafe idiot cafe jargon cafe kangaroo cafe lamb cafe halo cafe ravish banana oops cafe perish cafe qualify cafe ravish cafe nob cafe transformer cafe unique cafe vigor cafe wake cafe salvage cafe yogurt cafe zen cafe apple dentist banana dentist X-ray cafe

True

The XML structure shown has several errors, which are as follows:

1. Multiple opening tags are not closed properly. For example:
   - The `<F>` tag is not closed.
   - The `<G U="wy">` tag is not closed.
   - The `<H>` tag is not closed.
   - The `<I>` tag is not closed.
   - The `<J T="vy">` tag is not closed.
   - The `<K>` tag is not closed.
   - There are more similar issues with other tags that are not properly closed throughout the XML.

2. Nesting is not done properly. Opening and closing tags should be properly nested within each other, but in the given XML, many tags are started without closing the previous ones, which is incorrect.

3. There is text content ('apple') outside of any tag at the bottom of the XML, which is not allowed in well-formed XML.

To correct these errors, every opened tag must be appropriately closed and nested within its parent element. All text content must be enclosed within an opening and closing tag.
